price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߙߍ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߝߙߍ߬ߞߘߐ߬ߖߎ߰ߦߊ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߝߣߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߙߍ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߝߙߍ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߟߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
